alert.note: Alert for Fulton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 2:54PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fulton County through 330 PM EDT... At 254 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wauseon, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wauseon around 310 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Delta. This includes Interstate 80 in Ohio between mile markers 27 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
